resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: It is the corpse of a suicide victim. It is shown hanging on a gallows to emphasize the disgraceful nature of the act and to convey that the person is considered a criminal. Here, the visibility of the corpse accentuates the ignominious nature of the punishment, unlike other representations of corpses. The fact that it is placed at the edge of the image emphasizes the exclusion of the wicked dead.
resource.chars: It is the corpse of a suicide victim. It is shown hanging on a gallows to emphasize the disgraceful nature of the act and to convey that the person is considered a criminal. Here, the visibility of the corpse accentuates the ignominious nature of the punishment, unlike other representations of corpses. The fact that it is placed at the edge of the image emphasizes the exclusion of the wicked dead.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The marginalized corpse. It emphasizes the theme of the Fall, damnation, the loss of resemblance to God, and eternal death
resource.chars: The marginalized corpse. It emphasizes the theme of the Fall, damnation, the loss of resemblance to God, and eternal death
